cookieConsent.title: Cookie Settings
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to provide the best experience on our Artovnia platform. You can manage your cookie preferences below.

necessary.title: Necessary
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled.

functional.title: Functional
functional.description: These cookies enable additional features such as remembering preferences.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how users interact with our website.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: These cookies are used to display personalized advertisements.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: These cookies help optimize website performance and improve loading speeds.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Artovnia
meta.description: Artovnia Privacy Policy - principles of processing and protecting our users' personal data.

meta.title: Terms of Use - Artovnia
meta.description: Artovnia online store terms of use - rules for using the website and making purchases.
